title: vyarthavAyite
sahitya:
vyarthavAyite januma vyarthavAyite


anupallavi

  attalilla ittalilla artta mAna hAniyAgi


caraNam 1    kuruDanariveyennu hoseye karuvu medda teradante parar kADi tanda dhanavu putra mitrarigittu
    caraNam 2    taruNiyarige hitavilla taraLarige marukavilla baredu baredu orali arasuvariyada biTTe mADi
    caraNam 3    Uru Uru tirugi tirugi dAriannu naDedu naDedu sharIravu soragi karagi ghOra naraka sAdhane mADi
    caraNam 4    nAri magu muddADidare jAre nODi naguvante ghOra samsAra necci nIru kaDedu nODidante
    caraNam 5    narajanmadalli bandu dhareya mEle puTTi beLadu varada purandara viTtalana smaraNeyannu mADade
